name: Alphageddon
description:
Become a GOD and create a planet for yourself... but if something gets in your way... DESTROY IT!

Use all your destructive power in 6 different levels, to bring fire and destruction to those trying to take you away from your own creation.

CONTROLS:

On mobile: tap, drag, pinch.

On desktop: click, click/drag, scrollwheel (to zoom), WASD (on hidden level).
